title: Tasty Chicken Masala Roast ( Street Food Style ) Recipe
content:
Really spicy and lip-smackingly delicious street food style chicken masala roast. This taste so yummy with either roti, paratha or chapati.

This is a chicken roast or masala recipe that is so good. This recipe is spicy and kind of addictive. You will love it for sure. If you can add some lemon juice to increase the taste.

 

Street Food Style Chicken Masala Roast Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 40 mins

Total time: 50 mins

 

Recipe type: Side

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Chicken - ½ kg

Coconut Oil - 5 tablespoons

Turmeric Powder - 1 teaspoon

Salt to taste

Dry Red Chilli - 10

Garlic - 6 cloves

Onion - 2 large chopped finely

Green Chillies - 3 to 4 slit

Garam Masala Powder - 2 teaspoons

Black Pepper Powder - 1 teaspoon

Coriander leaves a handful finely chopped

 

Instructions

Soak chillies in hot water. Drain and take it in a blender. Add garlic and grind it to a smooth paste. Set aside.

Take chicken, salt and turmeric powder in a bowl and mix well. Set aside for 30 mins.

Heat oil in a pan, add onions and chillies and cook till golden.

Add in chicken and sear well. Cover and cook for 15 to 20 mins.

Add in chilli puree and mix well. Cook till it dries up.

Now add in salt, garam masala powder and pepper powder. Mix well.

Add coriander leaves and mix well.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Couscous  With Sumac Chicken And Butter Mushrooms Recipe
Tasty zafrani ( Saffron ) Chicken Pulao Recipe
recommendations.content:
This is a delicious zafrani chicken pulao which is super easy to make and taste amazing. It is great for any party.
Pulao or biryani comes handy when coming to lunch box recipes. This recipe goes perfect with some raita, I served it with onion raita. You can enjoy yourself with any raita

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Caesar Salad Recipe
recommendations.content:
Chicken caesar salad tossed with creamy garlic and parmesan flavored creamy dressing topped with a poached egg.
I hope you will give this a try and let me know how it turns out for you.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
